section.title: Sample 3: using the HTML Simple Adder
section.para: There is one AUT configuration for the Simple Adder HTML, which starts the Simple Adder with Internet Explorer.

section.title: Sample 3: HTML test with the library
section.para: This test for the reuses the test that uses the actions from the library of unbound modules.

section.title: Sample 3.2: HTML test with multiple data sets
section.para: This test shows how a Test Case can be executed multiple times by adding more data sets.
